html_description:
When creating a list-type report field, we need to make sure the Initial value option comes after the list of values AND the List values option shows the created values as a comma-separated list, as shown below. Note that the list values should not truncate but wrap to next line ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bc64b5d2-1529-4a3d-8ac6-7d4dc13c067f)
